pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, July 10, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Riga, Latvia

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a flower-laying ceremony.

Freedom Monument
Central District, Riga, LV-1050

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

9:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Latvia, Māris Kučinskis.

The Cabinet of Ministers

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Prime Minister of Latvia, Māris Kučinskis.

Press Conference Room
The Cabinet of Ministers

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of Latvia, Raimonds Vējonis.

President’s Office
Riga Castle

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

Ādaži, Latvia

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will tour and visit with troops at the Ādaži Military Base.

Parade Square
Ādaži Military Base

Note for media:

    • Open coverage for accredited media

9:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Brussels, Belgium.

Closed to media

Brussels, Belgium

10:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Brussels, Belgium.

Melsbroek Military Airbase

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity
